paper_abstract: We introduce a fast sparse approximation schemes of extreme learning machine (ELM) named FSA-ELM of extreme learning machine (ELM). Our algorithms have two compelling features: low complexity and sparse solution. Experiments on benchmark data sets show that the proposed algorithm obtains sparse classifiers at a rather low complexity without sacrificing the generalization performance. As validated by the simulation results, FSA-ELM tends to have better scalability and achieves similar or much better generalization performance with much faster learning speed than the traditional ELM algorithm. (C) 2013 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Fast sparse approximation of extreme learning machine
